stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why the class will not compile?

features.html:
Consider the following class definition. The class does not compile.

 

public class Info 
{ 
   private String name; 
   private int number; 
 
   public Info(String n, int num) 
   { 
      name = n; 
      number = num; 
   } 
 
   public void changeName(String newName) 
   { 
      name = newName; 
   } 
 
   public int addNum(int n) 
   { 
      num += n; 
      return num; 
   } 
}

choicesHtml: The class is missing an accessor method.
The instance variables  name  and  number  should be designated  public  instead of  private.
The return type for the  Info  constructor is missing.
The variable  num  is not defined in the  addNum  method.
